spatial_accuracy.notes: Major structural deviations identified. The 2-car garage has been entirely hallucinated as a oversized secondary master suite. The Study has been replaced by a bathroom. Door swing orientations and the foyer entry sequence do not match the source plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Severe fidelity failure. While some interior wall perimeters are maintained, the conversion of utility/functional zones (garage) into living space constitutes a critical failure. Several interior doors have been replaced by open archways or solid walls.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture in the kitchen and master bedroom is reasonably placed, but the addition of beds in non-bedroom areas (garage hallway) and incorrect furniture in the study/dining zones reduces the score.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High visual quality. Lighting is realistic and the isometric camera projection is consistent. Geometry is clean despite the plan inaccuracies.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated second master bedroom replacing the 2-car garage.
Missing garage doors and utility room infrastructure.
The Study in the lower-left corner has been incorrectly rendered as a bathroom/wet room.
Incorrect door orientation in the central hall and foyer entrance.
Proportion distortion in the bedroom wing; hallways are wider than the blueprint specifications.
Rendering artifact in the 'Maternal Door' area leading to Bedroom #3; wall is partially phased out.
